improvements.reason: On 2026-02-11 (holiday), only 2 staff members managed floor operations while customers waited and kitchen was overwhelmed. Holiday demand requires additional staffing.

overall_judgement.label: needs_improvement
overall_judgement.reason: Two consecutive report days show elevated demand (Friday + holiday) with customer wait times, high staff fatigue, and staffing constraints. While no major incidents occurred, the 2026-02-11 holiday operation revealed insufficient floor staffing (2 staff for full-capacity service). Morning operations on 2026-02-07 were manageable, but escalating afternoon/evening peaks and recurring minor issues suggest need for better peak-hour planning and resource allocation.
